sc_one_title: and drive modern state-of-art war machines
bookmark__text: and receive the Type 59-IIA Legend and 7  days of Premium Time directly to your account!
about_text: New update is live! Fight your enemies amidst the remains of the fallen civilizations.
about_desc: Summer of 2044 brought worldwide calamity: extremely powerful earthquakes and massive volcano eruptions destroyed entire civilizations in mere hours and humanity was brought to the brink of extinction.
tanks_text: Receive 5 Premium Russian war machines, skins, gold and other bonuses!
awards_text: Special bundle is available for new players: enter the game daily and receive Reputation, Gold, 30 days of Premium Time, Object 279 Main Battle Tank and other valuable rewards.
awards_desc_p1: New section will be available in the game menu after you purchase the bundle.
awards_desc_p2: All special rewards including Gold, Premium Time, Credits and Premium War Machines can be claimed during the 30 days period right from this new menu section.
services_decs_text0: Engage in challenging, fast-paced player versus player combat that takes place in hotspots around the globe.
services_decs_text1: Drive powerful Battle Machines of 5 different classes, each with its own advantages, game mechanics and tactical approach.
services_decs_text2: Armor-Piercing, HEAT, High-Explosive, Thermobaric - choose your ammunition wisely and dominate your opponents.
services_decs_text3: Form a special battle unit with 4 other players and complete dozens of special contracts versus AI opponents with scaling difficulty.
services_decs_text4: Prepare to wage war at tropical coasts, deserts, lost islands, ice plains, and other types of terrain.
services_decs_text5: Call in special reinforcement units consisting of grenade throwers, mortar men or snipers and quickly turn the outcome of the fight in your favor.
